text.footprintparticle.option.title: Footprint Particle
text.footprintparticle.option.applyBlock:
Blocks that footprint will appear.
Format: §9§omodid:blockid§r
Use only when hardness-based inner filter cannot suit your requirements.
text.footprintparticle.option.excludedMo:
Mobs in this list will not generate footprint.
Format: §9§omodid:mobid§r
text.footprintparticle.option.sizePerMob:
Set a separate size for a mob.
Format: §9§omodid:mobid,size§r
Default is 0.5 for most mob.
Lower priority than excluded.
